name: Blomso
description: For farmers that want to reduce operating cost and digitize operations, we provide a novel live rate soil sensing tech and SaaS based solution to reduce fertilizer waste, validate carbon capture, and bring digitization into the agricultural sector.
one_liner: For farmers that want to reduce operating cost and digitize operations, we provide a novel live rate soil sensing tech and SaaS based solution to reduce fertilizer waste, validate carbon capture, and bring digitization into the agricultural sector.
